metadata.title: QRATUM XENON v5 Genomic Discoveries Dataset
metadata.description: 100 novel genomic discoveries spanning human, model organism, and synthetic genomes

discoveries.title: CpG Island Hypermethylation Silencing IL6 in Tissue-Specific Manner
discoveries.hypothesis: Promoter methylation at IL6 (>60% CpG methylation) inversely correlates with NF-kappaB inflammatory response activity (r < -0.7)
discoveries.core_mechanism: Oxidative stress induces TET1-mediated demethylation at IL6 promoter CpG island. Bisulfite sequencing reveals 45% reduction in methylation, correlating with NF-kappaB inflammatory response reactivation in adipose tissue (Spearman rho = -0.82).

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM EpigeneticModifierDiscovery:
    INPUT: bisulfite_seq_case, bisulfite_seq_control, rna_seq

    meth_matrix_case = BISMARK_quantify(bisulfite_seq_case)
    meth_matrix_ctrl = BISMARK_quantify(bisulfite_seq_control)

    dmrs = DSS_call_DMR(
        case=meth_matrix_case,
        control=meth_matrix_ctrl,
        delta_beta=0.2,
        min_cpgs=5
    )

    FOR each DMR IN dmrs:
        nearby_genes = ANNOTATE_nearest_genes(DMR, distance=10kb)
        FOR each gene IN nearby_genes:
            expr_corr = CORRELATE(DMR.methylation, gene.expression)
            IF abs(expr_corr.r) > 0.6 AND expr_corr.pval < 0.01:
                chromatin = ENCODE_chromatin_state(DMR)
                IF chromatin IN ['promoter', 'enhancer']:
                    YIELD epigenetic_discovery(DMR, gene, expr_corr)

    OUTPUT: differentially_methylated_regulatory_regions
formulation.formal_specification: CpG in promoter(IL6): beta_methylation in [0,1] AND d(Expression)/d(beta) < 0 (anti-correlated)

validation.method: In vivo mouse model phenotypic assessment
validation.expected_outcome: Methylation-expression correlation |r| > 0.6, ChIP-seq peak overlap > 80%

industrial_impact.application: Epigenetic biomarker for early detection, DNA methylation-based classifier, liquid biopsy

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: IL6 x Environmental Factor Epistasis Driving Phenotypic Plasticity
discoveries.hypothesis: Dietary metabolite exposure modifies IL6 penetrance through PI3K/AKT/mTOR signaling-dependent epigenetic priming (interaction P < 0.001)
discoveries.core_mechanism: Dietary folate modulates one-carbon metabolism, altering SAM:SAH ratio. This shifts DNMT3A activity at IL6 locus, creating bistable methylation states in adrenal cortex that gate PI3K/AKT/mTOR signaling responsiveness to subsequent stimuli.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM GeneEnvironmentInteraction:
    INPUT: genotypes, phenotypes, environmental_exposures

    geno_matrix = STANDARDIZE(genotypes)
    env_matrix = STANDARDIZE(environmental_exposures)

    FOR each SNP IN geno_matrix:
        FOR each ENV IN env_matrix:
            # Full interaction model
            model = LINEAR_MIXED_MODEL(
                phenotype ~ SNP + ENV + SNP*ENV + covariates,
                random=~1|family
            )

            interaction_pval = model.pvalue['SNP*ENV']
            IF interaction_pval < (0.05 / n_tests):  # Bonferroni
                # Stratified analysis
                effect_low_env = EFFECT_in_stratum(SNP, ENV < median)
                effect_high_env = EFFECT_in_stratum(SNP, ENV >= median)

                IF sign(effect_low_env) != sign(effect_high_env):
                    YIELD crossover_interaction(SNP, ENV, model)
                ELIF abs(effect_high_env) > 2*abs(effect_low_env):
                    YIELD amplifying_interaction(SNP, ENV, model)

    OUTPUT: significant_gene_environment_interactions
formulation.formal_specification: beta_GxE(v,E) != 0: P(interaction) < alpha_bonf AND |beta_high_E - beta_low_E| > 2*SE

validation.expected_outcome: Interaction p < Bonferroni threshold, replication in 2+ cohorts, biological plausibility

industrial_impact.application: Precision prevention program, personalized lifestyle intervention, risk stratification

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: Novel Rare Pathogenic Variant in APC Associated with Developmental Phenotype in Caenorhabditis elegans
discoveries.hypothesis: Loss-of-function variants in APC disrupt Glycolysis/gluconeogenesis signaling, resulting in measurable phenotypic divergence with effect size >0.5 standard deviations
discoveries.core_mechanism: The variant introduces a premature stop codon at position p.R248*, leading to nonsense-mediated decay of APC mRNA. In retinal ganglion, this eliminates negative feedback on Glycolysis/gluconeogenesis, causing constitutive activation and downstream gene expression changes detectable by RNA-seq (FDR < 0.05).

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM RareVariantDiscovery:
    INPUT: WGS_reads, reference_genome, phenotype_matrix

    aligned_reads = BWA_MEM(WGS_reads, reference_genome)
    variants = GATK_HaplotypeCaller(aligned_reads, confidence=30)

    FOR each variant IN variants:
        IF MAF(variant) < 0.01:
            annotation = VEP_annotate(variant)
            IF annotation.impact IN ['HIGH', 'MODERATE']:
                cadd_score = CADD_score(variant)
                IF cadd_score > 20:
                    burden_test = SKAT_O(variant, phenotype_matrix)
                    IF burden_test.pvalue < 5e-8:
                        YIELD validated_discovery(variant, annotation)

    OUTPUT: prioritized_rare_variants with functional evidence
formulation.formal_specification: For all v in Variants(APC): MAF(v) < 0.01 AND CADD(v) > 20 implies P(pathogenic|v) > 0.9

validation.expected_outcome: Effect size > 0.5 SD, penetrance > 0.8, AUROC for classification > 0.85

industrial_impact.application: Diagnostic genetic test development, newborn screening panel inclusion, carrier testing

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: Population-Frequency EGF Polymorphism Modulating Drug Response Across Ancestries
discoveries.hypothesis: The minor allele at EGF rs-variant confers differential protein binding affinity (Kd ratio >2.0), altering pathway flux through Autophagy regulation
discoveries.core_mechanism: The T>C transition creates a novel binding site for transcription factor STAT3 in the EGF promoter. ChIP-seq in cochlear hair cells confirms increased STAT3 occupancy (fold-enrichment = 4.2), amplifying Autophagy regulation output under inflammatory conditions.

equations: LD_Score = Sum_j(r^2_ij) for tag SNP i
formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM CommonVariantAssociation:
    INPUT: genotype_array, phenotype_vector, covariates

    qc_genotypes = PLINK_QC(genotype_array, maf=0.01, hwe=1e-6, geno=0.02)
    pca_components = FLASHPCA(qc_genotypes, n_components=20)

    FOR each SNP IN qc_genotypes:
        beta, se, pval = LINEAR_REGRESSION(
            phenotype ~ SNP + covariates + pca_components
        )
        IF pval < 5e-8:
            fine_map = FINEMAP(SNP, ld_matrix, n_causal=1)
            credible_set = SUSIE(region, pip_threshold=0.95)
            functional = ENCODE_overlap(credible_set)
            YIELD gwas_hit(SNP, beta, fine_map, functional)

    OUTPUT: genome_wide_significant_associations
formulation.formal_specification: Exists beta in R: beta != 0 AND SE(beta) < |beta|/2 AND p(beta=0) < 5e-8 for EGF <-> trait

validation.expected_outcome: Replication p < 0.05 in independent cohort, consistent effect direction, PIP > 0.5

industrial_impact.application: Polygenic risk score development, pharmacogenomic dosing algorithm, companion diagnostic

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: Engineered RAD51 Variant with Enhanced Therapeutic Activity
discoveries.hypothesis: Codon-optimized RAD51 construct achieves >3-fold increased protein yield while maintaining native Cell cycle control engagement
discoveries.core_mechanism: Machine learning-optimized RAD51 coding sequence removes RNA secondary structure (deltaG increased by 8.2 kcal/mol) and rare codons. Ribosome profiling shows 3.5-fold increased translation efficiency in retinal ganglion, hyperactivating Cell cycle control.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM SyntheticAlleleDesign:
    INPUT: target_gene, optimization_objectives, constraints

    wt_sequence = FETCH_reference(target_gene)
    protein_structure = ALPHAFOLD_predict(wt_sequence)

    codon_optimized = CAI_optimize(
        wt_sequence,
        host_organism='human',
        gc_content_target=0.55
    )

    mfe_optimized = NUPACK_minimize_structure(codon_optimized)

    FOR mutation_site IN protein_structure.active_sites:
        variants = ROSETTA_design(
            protein_structure,
            site=mutation_site,
            objective='stability'
        )
        FOR var IN variants:
            IF var.ddG < -2.0 AND var.solubility_score > 0.8:
                toxicity = PREDICT_toxicity(var.sequence)
                IF NOT toxicity.flagged:
                    YIELD synthetic_candidate(var, stability=var.ddG)

    OUTPUT: optimized_synthetic_allele_designs
formulation.formal_specification: Synthetic(RAD51): CAI > 0.8 AND MFE_structure > -20 kcal/mol AND translation_rate > 3x wildtype

validation.method: In silico simulation with 10,000 bootstrapped replicates
validation.expected_outcome: Expression increase > 3-fold, protein function retained (> 80% wildtype activity)

industrial_impact.application: Gene therapy vector optimization, mRNA therapeutic design, protein replacement therapy

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: Cross-Modal PTEN Regulatory Axis Spanning Transcriptome to Metabolome
discoveries.hypothesis: Transcript-protein-metabolite cascade from PTEN exhibits coherent temporal dynamics (lag < 2h) through Glycolysis/gluconeogenesis
discoveries.core_mechanism: Phosphoproteomic time-course reveals PTEN-encoded kinase phosphorylates 23 substrates within 15 minutes of stimulation. Downstream metabolite flux through Glycolysis/gluconeogenesis increases 2.8-fold in adrenal cortex, detected by LC-MS.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM MultiOmicsIntegration:
    INPUT: transcriptomics, proteomics, metabolomics, sample_metadata

    # Normalize each modality
    rna_norm = VOOM_TMM_normalize(transcriptomics)
    prot_norm = QUANTILE_normalize(proteomics)
    metab_norm = PARETO_scale(metabolomics)

    # Multi-block integration
    mofa_model = MOFA2_fit(
        views=[rna_norm, prot_norm, metab_norm],
        n_factors=15,
        convergence_tol=1e-4
    )

    FOR each factor IN mofa_model.factors:
        # Identify top features per modality
        rna_features = TOP_LOADINGS(factor, view='rna', n=50)
        prot_features = TOP_LOADINGS(factor, view='protein', n=50)
        metab_features = TOP_LOADINGS(factor, view='metabolite', n=50)

        # Test biological coherence
        pathway_enrich = GSEA(rna_features, gene_sets='KEGG')
        IF pathway_enrich.fdr < 0.05:
            # Validate temporal coherence
            lag_corr = CROSS_CORRELATION(
                rna_features.expression,
                prot_features.abundance,
                max_lag=24h
            )
            IF lag_corr.optimal_lag < 6h:
                YIELD omics_axis(factor, rna_features, prot_features, metab_features)

    OUTPUT: integrated_multi_omics_factors
formulation.formal_specification: For all (x_RNA, x_protein, x_metab) in PTEN_cascade: MI(x_i, x_j) > 0.3 AND lag < 6h

validation.expected_outcome: Temporal lag < 6h between layers, pathway coherence score > 0.7, perturbation confirms directionality

industrial_impact.application: Multi-modal biomarker panel, systems pharmacology model, digital twin development

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: Novel BRCA1-Centered Signaling Hub Linking Metabolism and Immunity
discoveries.hypothesis: BRCA1 functions as master regulator hub connecting Wnt/beta-catenin to three or more downstream effector modules
discoveries.core_mechanism: Interactome mapping identifies BRCA1 protein as a scaffold bridging Wnt/beta-catenin kinases with previously unlinked autophagy machinery. Proximity labeling (BioID) in brain cortex captures 47 high-confidence interactors, 8 of which are novel.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM PathwayDiscovery:
    INPUT: differential_expression, protein_interactions, metabolic_network

    de_genes = FILTER(differential_expression, padj < 0.01, abs_lfc > 1)

    # Seed expansion on PPI network
    seed_subnetwork = RANDOM_WALK_RESTART(
        ppi_graph=protein_interactions,
        seeds=de_genes,
        restart_prob=0.4,
        max_steps=1000
    )

    # Module detection
    modules = LEIDEN_clustering(seed_subnetwork, resolution=1.0)

    FOR each module IN modules:
        # Functional enrichment
        go_enrich = HYPERGEOMETRIC_test(module.genes, GO_terms)
        kegg_enrich = HYPERGEOMETRIC_test(module.genes, KEGG_pathways)

        IF NOT go_enrich.hits:  # Potentially novel pathway
            # Validate with metabolic connectivity
            metab_links = MAP_to_metabolic_network(module.genes, metabolic_network)
            flux_change = FBA_flux_analysis(metab_links, constraints=de_genes)

            IF flux_change.significance < 0.01:
                hub_genes = CENTRALITY_analysis(module)
                YIELD novel_pathway(module, hub_genes, metab_links, flux_change)

    OUTPUT: discovered_pathway_modules
formulation.formal_specification: Module superset BRCA1: |Module| > 10 genes AND density > 0.3 AND GO_enrichment_FDR < 0.05

validation.expected_outcome: Module coherence > 0.6, flux prediction accuracy > 75%, novel interactions validate in Co-IP

industrial_impact.application: Novel drug target, mechanism-based therapeutic design, repurposing opportunity identification

failure_modes: Hub gene artifact from study bias
mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM PathwayDiscovery:
    INPUT: differential_expression, protein_interactions, metabolic_network

    de_genes = FILTER(differential_expression, padj < 0.01, abs_lfc > 1)

    # Seed expansion on PPI network
    seed_subnetwork = RANDOM_WALK_RESTART(
        ppi_graph=protein_interactions,
        seeds=de_genes,
        restart_prob=0.4,
        max_steps=1000
    )

    # Module detection
    modules = LEIDEN_clustering(seed_subnetwork, resolution=1.0)

    FOR each module IN modules:
        # Functional enrichment
        go_enrich = HYPERGEOMETRIC_test(module.genes, GO_terms)
        kegg_enrich = HYPERGEOMETRIC_test(module.genes, KEGG_pathways)

        IF NOT go_enrich.hits:  # Potentially novel pathway
            # Validate with metabolic connectivity
            metab_links = MAP_to_metabolic_network(module.genes, metabolic_network)
            flux_change = FBA_flux_analysis(metab_links, constraints=de_genes)

            IF flux_change.significance < 0.01:
                hub_genes = CENTRALITY_analysis(module)
                YIELD novel_pathway(module, hub_genes, metab_links, flux_change)

    OUTPUT: discovered_pathway_modules

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM SyntheticAlleleDesign:
    INPUT: target_gene, optimization_objectives, constraints

    wt_sequence = FETCH_reference(target_gene)
    protein_structure = ALPHAFOLD_predict(wt_sequence)

    codon_optimized = CAI_optimize(
        wt_sequence,
        host_organism='human',
        gc_content_target=0.55
    )

    mfe_optimized = NUPACK_minimize_structure(codon_optimized)

    FOR mutation_site IN protein_structure.active_sites:
        variants = ROSETTA_design(
            protein_structure,
            site=mutation_site,
            objective='stability'
        )
        FOR var IN variants:
            IF var.ddG < -2.0 AND var.solubility_score > 0.8:
                toxicity = PREDICT_toxicity(var.sequence)
                IF NOT toxicity.flagged:
                    YIELD synthetic_candidate(var, stability=var.ddG)

    OUTPUT: optimized_synthetic_allele_designs

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM RegulatoryNetworkInference:
    INPUT: scRNA_seq, ATAC_seq, TF_motifs

    gene_expr = SEURAT_normalize(scRNA_seq)
    chromatin_access = MACS2_peaks(ATAC_seq)

    grn_scaffold = SCENIC_infer_regulons(gene_expr, TF_motifs)
    enhancer_links = ABC_model(chromatin_access, gene_expr, hic_data)

    FOR each TF_regulon IN grn_scaffold:
        target_genes = TF_regulon.targets
        FOR each target IN target_genes:
            enhancers = FILTER(enhancer_links, target_gene=target)
            IF TF.binding_site IN enhancers:
                confidence = GRNBOOST2_importance(TF, target)
                IF confidence > 0.8:
                    YIELD regulatory_edge(TF, target, enhancers, confidence)

    network = BUILD_NETWORK(all_edges)
    OUTPUT: tissue_specific_gene_regulatory_network

discoveries.title: IL6 x Environmental Factor Epistasis Driving Phenotypic Plasticity
discoveries.hypothesis: Dietary metabolite exposure modifies IL6 penetrance through NF-kappaB inflammatory response-dependent epigenetic priming (interaction P < 0.001)

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM GeneEnvironmentInteraction:
    INPUT: genotypes, phenotypes, environmental_exposures

    geno_matrix = STANDARDIZE(genotypes)
    env_matrix = STANDARDIZE(environmental_exposures)

    FOR each SNP IN geno_matrix:
        FOR each ENV IN env_matrix:
            # Full interaction model
            model = LINEAR_MIXED_MODEL(
                phenotype ~ SNP + ENV + SNP*ENV + covariates,
                random=~1|family
            )

            interaction_pval = model.pvalue['SNP*ENV']
            IF interaction_pval < (0.05 / n_tests):  # Bonferroni
                # Stratified analysis
                effect_low_env = EFFECT_in_stratum(SNP, ENV < median)
                effect_high_env = EFFECT_in_stratum(SNP, ENV >= median)

                IF sign(effect_low_env) != sign(effect_high_env):
                    YIELD crossover_interaction(SNP, ENV, model)

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM RegulatoryNetworkInference:
    INPUT: scRNA_seq, ATAC_seq, TF_motifs

    chromatin_access = MACS2_peaks(ATAC_seq)

        FOR each target IN target_genes:

            IF TF.binding_site IN enhancers:
                confidence = GRNBOOST2_importance(TF, target)
                IF confidence > 0.8:
                    YIELD regulatory_edge(TF, target, enhancers, confidence)

    network = BUILD_NETWORK(all_edges)
    OUTPUT: tissue_specific_gene_regulatory_network

discoveries.title: Positive Selection Signature at TP53 in High-Altitude Arabidopsis thaliana Populations
discoveries.hypothesis: Convergent evolution at TP53 in independent populations indicates strong selection coefficient (s > 0.01) for PI3K/AKT/mTOR signaling modulation
discoveries.core_mechanism: Hard selective sweep at TP53 (pi = 0.0002) fixed an amino acid substitution optimizing enzyme kinetics for PI3K/AKT/mTOR signaling. Ancestral reconstruction shows Km improved 4.7-fold, conferring metabolic advantage in kidney nephrons.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM EvolutionaryAdaptationScan:
    INPUT: population_vcf, population_metadata, ancestral_alleles

    # Calculate selection statistics
    FOR each region IN genome_windows(size=50kb, step=10kb):
        variants = EXTRACT_variants(population_vcf, region)

        pi = NUCLEOTIDE_DIVERSITY(variants)
        theta_w = WATTERSON_THETA(variants)
        tajimas_d = TAJIMA_D(pi, theta_w, n_samples)

        fst = HUDSON_FST(variants, population_metadata)
        xpehh = XP_EHH(variants, pop1='target', pop2='outgroup')
        ihs = INTEGRATED_HAPLOTYPE_SCORE(variants)

        composite_score = COMBINE_METRICS(tajimas_d, fst, xpehh, ihs)

        IF composite_score > empirical_threshold(0.001):
            genes = ANNOTATE_genes(region)
            functional = PREDICT_functional_impact(variants, genes)
            convergence = CHECK_convergent_evolution(region, other_species)

            YIELD adaptation_signal(region, composite_score, genes, functional)

    OUTPUT: genomic_regions_under_selection
formulation.formal_specification: Selection(TP53): Tajimas_D < -2 OR iHS > 2 OR FST > 99th_percentile

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM PathwayDiscovery:
    INPUT: differential_expression, protein_interactions, metabolic_network

    de_genes = FILTER(differential_expression, padj < 0.01, abs_lfc > 1)

    # Seed expansion on PPI network
    seed_subnetwork = RANDOM_WALK_RESTART(
        ppi_graph=protein_interactions,
        seeds=de_genes,
        restart_prob=0.4,
        max_steps=1000
    )

    # Module detection
    modules = LEIDEN_clustering(seed_subnetwork, resolution=1.0)

    FOR each module IN modules:
        # Functional enrichment
        go_enrich = HYPERGEOMETRIC_test(module.genes, GO_terms)
        kegg_enrich = HYPERGEOMETRIC_test(module.genes, KEGG_pathways)

        IF NOT go_enrich.hits:  # Potentially novel pathway
            # Validate with metabolic connectivity
            metab_links = MAP_to_metabolic_network(module.genes, metabolic_network)
            flux_change = FBA_flux_analysis(metab_links, constraints=de_genes)

            IF flux_change.significance < 0.01:
                hub_genes = CENTRALITY_analysis(module)
                YIELD novel_pathway(module, hub_genes, metab_links, flux_change)

    OUTPUT: discovered_pathway_modules
formulation.formal_specification: Module superset CHEK2: |Module| > 10 genes AND density > 0.3 AND GO_enrichment_FDR < 0.05

    INPUT: long_reads, short_reads, reference

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM EpigeneticModifierDiscovery:
    INPUT: bisulfite_seq_case, bisulfite_seq_control, rna_seq

    meth_matrix_case = BISMARK_quantify(bisulfite_seq_case)
    meth_matrix_ctrl = BISMARK_quantify(bisulfite_seq_control)

    dmrs = DSS_call_DMR(
        case=meth_matrix_case,
        control=meth_matrix_ctrl,
        delta_beta=0.2,
        min_cpgs=5
    )

    FOR each DMR IN dmrs:
        nearby_genes = ANNOTATE_nearest_genes(DMR, distance=10kb)
        FOR each gene IN nearby_genes:
            expr_corr = CORRELATE(DMR.methylation, gene.expression)
            IF abs(expr_corr.r) > 0.6 AND expr_corr.pval < 0.01:
                chromatin = ENCODE_chromatin_state(DMR)
                IF chromatin IN ['promoter', 'enhancer']:
                    YIELD epigenetic_discovery(DMR, gene, expr_corr)

    OUTPUT: differentially_methylated_regulatory_regions
formulation.formal_specification: CpG in promoter(APC): beta_methylation in [0,1] AND d(Expression)/d(beta) < 0 (anti-correlated)

discoveries.title: Cross-Modal FGF2 Regulatory Axis Spanning Transcriptome to Metabolome
discoveries.hypothesis: Transcript-protein-metabolite cascade from FGF2 exhibits coherent temporal dynamics (lag < 2h) through Lipid metabolism
discoveries.core_mechanism: Phosphoproteomic time-course reveals FGF2-encoded kinase phosphorylates 23 substrates within 15 minutes of stimulation. Downstream metabolite flux through Lipid metabolism increases 2.8-fold in retinal ganglion, detected by LC-MS.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM MultiOmicsIntegration:
    INPUT: transcriptomics, proteomics, metabolomics, sample_metadata

    # Normalize each modality
    rna_norm = VOOM_TMM_normalize(transcriptomics)
    prot_norm = QUANTILE_normalize(proteomics)
    metab_norm = PARETO_scale(metabolomics)

    # Multi-block integration
    mofa_model = MOFA2_fit(
        views=[rna_norm, prot_norm, metab_norm],
        n_factors=15,
        convergence_tol=1e-4
    )

    FOR each factor IN mofa_model.factors:
        # Identify top features per modality
        rna_features = TOP_LOADINGS(factor, view='rna', n=50)
        prot_features = TOP_LOADINGS(factor, view='protein', n=50)
        metab_features = TOP_LOADINGS(factor, view='metabolite', n=50)

        # Test biological coherence
        pathway_enrich = GSEA(rna_features, gene_sets='KEGG')
        IF pathway_enrich.fdr < 0.05:
            # Validate temporal coherence
            lag_corr = CROSS_CORRELATION(
                rna_features.expression,
                prot_features.abundance,
                max_lag=24h
            )
            IF lag_corr.optimal_lag < 6h:
                YIELD omics_axis(factor, rna_features, prot_features, metab_features)

    OUTPUT: integrated_multi_omics_factors
formulation.formal_specification: For all (x_RNA, x_protein, x_metab) in FGF2_cascade: MI(x_i, x_j) > 0.3 AND lag < 6h

discoveries.core_mechanism: Interactome mapping identifies MSH2 protein as a scaffold bridging TGF-beta pathway kinases with previously unlinked autophagy machinery. Proximity labeling (BioID) in adipose tissue captures 47 high-confidence interactors, 8 of which are novel.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM PathwayDiscovery:
    INPUT: differential_expression, protein_interactions, metabolic_network

    de_genes = FILTER(differential_expression, padj < 0.01, abs_lfc > 1)

    # Seed expansion on PPI network
    seed_subnetwork = RANDOM_WALK_RESTART(
        ppi_graph=protein_interactions,
        seeds=de_genes,
        restart_prob=0.4,
        max_steps=1000
    )

    # Module detection
    modules = LEIDEN_clustering(seed_subnetwork, resolution=1.0)

    FOR each module IN modules:
        # Functional enrichment
        go_enrich = HYPERGEOMETRIC_test(module.genes, GO_terms)
        kegg_enrich = HYPERGEOMETRIC_test(module.genes, KEGG_pathways)

        IF NOT go_enrich.hits:  # Potentially novel pathway
            # Validate with metabolic connectivity
            metab_links = MAP_to_metabolic_network(module.genes, metabolic_network)
            flux_change = FBA_flux_analysis(metab_links, constraints=de_genes)

            IF flux_change.significance < 0.01:
                hub_genes = CENTRALITY_analysis(module)
                YIELD novel_pathway(module, hub_genes, metab_links, flux_change)

    OUTPUT: discovered_pathway_modules
formulation.formal_specification: Module superset MSH2: |Module| > 10 genes AND density > 0.3 AND GO_enrichment_FDR < 0.05

validation.expected_outcome: Module coherence > 0.6, flux prediction accuracy > 75%, novel interactions validate in Co-IP

industrial_impact.application: Novel drug target, mechanism-based therapeutic design, repurposing opportunity identification

failure_modes: Hub gene artifact from study bias
mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: Cross-Modal BMP4 Regulatory Axis Spanning Transcriptome to Metabolome
discoveries.hypothesis: Transcript-protein-metabolite cascade from BMP4 exhibits coherent temporal dynamics (lag < 2h) through p53 tumor suppressor network
discoveries.core_mechanism: Phosphoproteomic time-course reveals BMP4-encoded kinase phosphorylates 23 substrates within 15 minutes of stimulation. Downstream metabolite flux through p53 tumor suppressor network increases 2.8-fold in intestinal crypts, detected by LC-MS.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM MultiOmicsIntegration:
    INPUT: transcriptomics, proteomics, metabolomics, sample_metadata

    # Normalize each modality
    rna_norm = VOOM_TMM_normalize(transcriptomics)
    prot_norm = QUANTILE_normalize(proteomics)
    metab_norm = PARETO_scale(metabolomics)

    # Multi-block integration
    mofa_model = MOFA2_fit(
        views=[rna_norm, prot_norm, metab_norm],
        n_factors=15,
        convergence_tol=1e-4
    )

    FOR each factor IN mofa_model.factors:
        # Identify top features per modality
        rna_features = TOP_LOADINGS(factor, view='rna', n=50)
        prot_features = TOP_LOADINGS(factor, view='protein', n=50)
        metab_features = TOP_LOADINGS(factor, view='metabolite', n=50)

        # Test biological coherence
        pathway_enrich = GSEA(rna_features, gene_sets='KEGG')
        IF pathway_enrich.fdr < 0.05:
            # Validate temporal coherence
            lag_corr = CROSS_CORRELATION(
                rna_features.expression,
                prot_features.abundance,
                max_lag=24h
            )
            IF lag_corr.optimal_lag < 6h:
                YIELD omics_axis(factor, rna_features, prot_features, metab_features)

    OUTPUT: integrated_multi_omics_factors
formulation.formal_specification: For all (x_RNA, x_protein, x_metab) in BMP4_cascade: MI(x_i, x_j) > 0.3 AND lag < 6h

validation.expected_outcome: Temporal lag < 6h between layers, pathway coherence score > 0.7, perturbation confirms directionality

industrial_impact.application: Multi-modal biomarker panel, systems pharmacology model, digital twin development

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: Novel Rare Pathogenic Variant in IFNG Associated with Developmental Phenotype in Danio rerio
discoveries.hypothesis: Loss-of-function variants in IFNG disrupt Cell cycle control signaling, resulting in measurable phenotypic divergence with effect size >0.5 standard deviations
discoveries.core_mechanism: The variant introduces a premature stop codon at position p.R248*, leading to nonsense-mediated decay of IFNG mRNA. In pancreatic islets, this eliminates negative feedback on Cell cycle control, causing constitutive activation and downstream gene expression changes detectable by RNA-seq (FDR < 0.05).

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM RareVariantDiscovery:
    INPUT: WGS_reads, reference_genome, phenotype_matrix

    aligned_reads = BWA_MEM(WGS_reads, reference_genome)
    variants = GATK_HaplotypeCaller(aligned_reads, confidence=30)

    FOR each variant IN variants:
        IF MAF(variant) < 0.01:
            annotation = VEP_annotate(variant)
            IF annotation.impact IN ['HIGH', 'MODERATE']:
                cadd_score = CADD_score(variant)
                IF cadd_score > 20:
                    burden_test = SKAT_O(variant, phenotype_matrix)
                    IF burden_test.pvalue < 5e-8:
                        YIELD validated_discovery(variant, annotation)

    OUTPUT: prioritized_rare_variants with functional evidence
formulation.formal_specification: For all v in Variants(IFNG): MAF(v) < 0.01 AND CADD(v) > 20 implies P(pathogenic|v) > 0.9

validation.expected_outcome: Effect size > 0.5 SD, penetrance > 0.8, AUROC for classification > 0.85

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses

discoveries.title: CpG Island Hypermethylation Silencing ATM in Tissue-Specific Manner
discoveries.hypothesis: Promoter methylation at ATM (>60% CpG methylation) inversely correlates with PI3K/AKT/mTOR signaling activity (r < -0.7)
discoveries.core_mechanism: Oxidative stress induces TET1-mediated demethylation at ATM promoter CpG island. Bisulfite sequencing reveals 45% reduction in methylation, correlating with PI3K/AKT/mTOR signaling reactivation in kidney nephrons (Spearman rho = -0.82).

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM EpigeneticModifierDiscovery:
    INPUT: bisulfite_seq_case, bisulfite_seq_control, rna_seq

    meth_matrix_case = BISMARK_quantify(bisulfite_seq_case)
    meth_matrix_ctrl = BISMARK_quantify(bisulfite_seq_control)

    dmrs = DSS_call_DMR(
        case=meth_matrix_case,
        control=meth_matrix_ctrl,
        delta_beta=0.2,
        min_cpgs=5
    )

    FOR each DMR IN dmrs:
        nearby_genes = ANNOTATE_nearest_genes(DMR, distance=10kb)
        FOR each gene IN nearby_genes:
            expr_corr = CORRELATE(DMR.methylation, gene.expression)
            IF abs(expr_corr.r) > 0.6 AND expr_corr.pval < 0.01:
                chromatin = ENCODE_chromatin_state(DMR)
                IF chromatin IN ['promoter', 'enhancer']:
                    YIELD epigenetic_discovery(DMR, gene, expr_corr)

    OUTPUT: differentially_methylated_regulatory_regions
formulation.formal_specification: CpG in promoter(ATM): beta_methylation in [0,1] AND d(Expression)/d(beta) < 0 (anti-correlated)

validation.expected_outcome: Methylation-expression correlation |r| > 0.6, ChIP-seq peak overlap > 80%

industrial_impact.application: Epigenetic biomarker for early detection, DNA methylation-based classifier, liquid biopsy

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: Long-Range Chromatin Interaction Network Regulating MECP2 Expression
discoveries.hypothesis: Topologically associating domain (TAD) boundaries at MECP2 locus encode positional information directing tissue-specific Lipid metabolism activation
discoveries.core_mechanism: Super-enhancer at MECP2 locus integrates signals from 12 transcription factors. Phase-separated condensates visualized by IF co-localize BRD4 and MED1 at MECP2, coordinating burst-like transcription feeding into Lipid metabolism.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM RegulatoryNetworkInference:
    INPUT: scRNA_seq, ATAC_seq, TF_motifs

    gene_expr = SEURAT_normalize(scRNA_seq)
    chromatin_access = MACS2_peaks(ATAC_seq)

    grn_scaffold = SCENIC_infer_regulons(gene_expr, TF_motifs)
    enhancer_links = ABC_model(chromatin_access, gene_expr, hic_data)

    FOR each TF_regulon IN grn_scaffold:
        target_genes = TF_regulon.targets
        FOR each target IN target_genes:
            enhancers = FILTER(enhancer_links, target_gene=target)
            IF TF.binding_site IN enhancers:
                confidence = GRNBOOST2_importance(TF, target)
                IF confidence > 0.8:
                    YIELD regulatory_edge(TF, target, enhancers, confidence)

    network = BUILD_NETWORK(all_edges)
    OUTPUT: tissue_specific_gene_regulatory_network
formulation.formal_specification: TF -> MECP2: binding_affinity(TF, motif) > Kd_threshold AND chromatin_accessible = TRUE

validation.expected_outcome: TF perturbation changes target expression (p < 0.001), CRISPR screen validates > 70% edges

discoveries.title: Population-Frequency SOD1 Polymorphism Modulating Drug Response Across Ancestries
discoveries.hypothesis: The minor allele at SOD1 rs-variant confers differential protein binding affinity (Kd ratio >2.0), altering pathway flux through JAK/STAT signaling
discoveries.core_mechanism: The T>C transition creates a novel binding site for transcription factor STAT3 in the SOD1 promoter. ChIP-seq in cardiac myocytes confirms increased STAT3 occupancy (fold-enrichment = 4.2), amplifying JAK/STAT signaling output under inflammatory conditions.

equations: LD_Score = Sum_j(r^2_ij) for tag SNP i
formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM CommonVariantAssociation:
    INPUT: genotype_array, phenotype_vector, covariates

    qc_genotypes = PLINK_QC(genotype_array, maf=0.01, hwe=1e-6, geno=0.02)
    pca_components = FLASHPCA(qc_genotypes, n_components=20)

    FOR each SNP IN qc_genotypes:
        beta, se, pval = LINEAR_REGRESSION(
            phenotype ~ SNP + covariates + pca_components
        )
        IF pval < 5e-8:
            fine_map = FINEMAP(SNP, ld_matrix, n_causal=1)
            credible_set = SUSIE(region, pip_threshold=0.95)
            functional = ENCODE_overlap(credible_set)
            YIELD gwas_hit(SNP, beta, fine_map, functional)

    OUTPUT: genome_wide_significant_associations
formulation.formal_specification: Exists beta in R: beta != 0 AND SE(beta) < |beta|/2 AND p(beta=0) < 5e-8 for SOD1 <-> trait

validation.method: In vivo mouse model phenotypic assessment
validation.expected_outcome: Replication p < 0.05 in independent cohort, consistent effect direction, PIP > 0.5

discoveries.title: Engineered PTEN Variant with Enhanced Therapeutic Activity
discoveries.hypothesis: Codon-optimized PTEN construct achieves >3-fold increased protein yield while maintaining native TGF-beta pathway engagement
discoveries.core_mechanism: Machine learning-optimized PTEN coding sequence removes RNA secondary structure (deltaG increased by 8.2 kcal/mol) and rare codons. Ribosome profiling shows 3.5-fold increased translation efficiency in bone marrow, hyperactivating TGF-beta pathway.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM SyntheticAlleleDesign:
    INPUT: target_gene, optimization_objectives, constraints

    wt_sequence = FETCH_reference(target_gene)
    protein_structure = ALPHAFOLD_predict(wt_sequence)

    codon_optimized = CAI_optimize(
        wt_sequence,
        host_organism='human',
        gc_content_target=0.55
    )

    mfe_optimized = NUPACK_minimize_structure(codon_optimized)

    FOR mutation_site IN protein_structure.active_sites:
        variants = ROSETTA_design(
            protein_structure,
            site=mutation_site,
            objective='stability'
        )
        FOR var IN variants:
            IF var.ddG < -2.0 AND var.solubility_score > 0.8:
                toxicity = PREDICT_toxicity(var.sequence)
                IF NOT toxicity.flagged:
                    YIELD synthetic_candidate(var, stability=var.ddG)

    OUTPUT: optimized_synthetic_allele_designs
formulation.formal_specification: Synthetic(PTEN): CAI > 0.8 AND MFE_structure > -20 kcal/mol AND translation_rate > 3x wildtype

validation.method: In silico simulation with 10,000 bootstrapped replicates
validation.expected_outcome: Expression increase > 3-fold, protein function retained (> 80% wildtype activity)

industrial_impact.application: Gene therapy vector optimization, mRNA therapeutic design, protein replacement therapy

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: Positive Selection Signature at BRCA2 in High-Altitude Homo sapiens Populations
discoveries.hypothesis: Convergent evolution at BRCA2 in independent populations indicates strong selection coefficient (s > 0.01) for Circadian rhythm modulation
discoveries.core_mechanism: Hard selective sweep at BRCA2 (pi = 0.0002) fixed an amino acid substitution optimizing enzyme kinetics for Circadian rhythm. Ancestral reconstruction shows Km improved 4.7-fold, conferring metabolic advantage in skin keratinocytes.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM EvolutionaryAdaptationScan:
    INPUT: population_vcf, population_metadata, ancestral_alleles

    # Calculate selection statistics
    FOR each region IN genome_windows(size=50kb, step=10kb):
        variants = EXTRACT_variants(population_vcf, region)

        pi = NUCLEOTIDE_DIVERSITY(variants)
        theta_w = WATTERSON_THETA(variants)
        tajimas_d = TAJIMA_D(pi, theta_w, n_samples)

        fst = HUDSON_FST(variants, population_metadata)
        xpehh = XP_EHH(variants, pop1='target', pop2='outgroup')
        ihs = INTEGRATED_HAPLOTYPE_SCORE(variants)

        composite_score = COMBINE_METRICS(tajimas_d, fst, xpehh, ihs)

        IF composite_score > empirical_threshold(0.001):
            genes = ANNOTATE_genes(region)
            functional = PREDICT_functional_impact(variants, genes)
            convergence = CHECK_convergent_evolution(region, other_species)

            YIELD adaptation_signal(region, composite_score, genes, functional)

    OUTPUT: genomic_regions_under_selection
formulation.formal_specification: Selection(BRCA2): Tajimas_D < -2 OR iHS > 2 OR FST > 99th_percentile

validation.expected_outcome: Selection signal replicates in independent populations, functional assay confirms fitness effect

industrial_impact.application: Population-specific drug development, ancestry-informed medicine, evolutionary medicine

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: MECP2 x Environmental Factor Epistasis Driving Phenotypic Plasticity
discoveries.hypothesis: Dietary metabolite exposure modifies MECP2 penetrance through JAK/STAT signaling-dependent epigenetic priming (interaction P < 0.001)
discoveries.core_mechanism: Dietary folate modulates one-carbon metabolism, altering SAM:SAH ratio. This shifts DNMT3A activity at MECP2 locus, creating bistable methylation states in pancreatic islets that gate JAK/STAT signaling responsiveness to subsequent stimuli.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM GeneEnvironmentInteraction:
    INPUT: genotypes, phenotypes, environmental_exposures

    geno_matrix = STANDARDIZE(genotypes)
    env_matrix = STANDARDIZE(environmental_exposures)

    FOR each SNP IN geno_matrix:
        FOR each ENV IN env_matrix:
            # Full interaction model
            model = LINEAR_MIXED_MODEL(
                phenotype ~ SNP + ENV + SNP*ENV + covariates,
                random=~1|family
            )

            interaction_pval = model.pvalue['SNP*ENV']
            IF interaction_pval < (0.05 / n_tests):  # Bonferroni
                # Stratified analysis
                effect_low_env = EFFECT_in_stratum(SNP, ENV < median)
                effect_high_env = EFFECT_in_stratum(SNP, ENV >= median)

                IF sign(effect_low_env) != sign(effect_high_env):
                    YIELD crossover_interaction(SNP, ENV, model)
                ELIF abs(effect_high_env) > 2*abs(effect_low_env):
                    YIELD amplifying_interaction(SNP, ENV, model)

    OUTPUT: significant_gene_environment_interactions
formulation.formal_specification: beta_GxE(v,E) != 0: P(interaction) < alpha_bonf AND |beta_high_E - beta_low_E| > 2*SE

validation.expected_outcome: Interaction p < Bonferroni threshold, replication in 2+ cohorts, biological plausibility

industrial_impact.application: Precision prevention program, personalized lifestyle intervention, risk stratification

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

ALGORITHM EvolutionaryAdaptationScan:
    INPUT: population_vcf, population_metadata, ancestral_alleles

    # Calculate selection statistics
    FOR each region IN genome_windows(size=50kb, step=10kb):
        variants = EXTRACT_variants(population_vcf, region)

        pi = NUCLEOTIDE_DIVERSITY(variants)
        theta_w = WATTERSON_THETA(variants)
        tajimas_d = TAJIMA_D(pi, theta_w, n_samples)

        fst = HUDSON_FST(variants, population_metadata)
        xpehh = XP_EHH(variants, pop1='target', pop2='outgroup')
        ihs = INTEGRATED_HAPLOTYPE_SCORE(variants)

        composite_score = COMBINE_METRICS(tajimas_d, fst, xpehh, ihs)

        IF composite_score > empirical_threshold(0.001):
            genes = ANNOTATE_genes(region)
            functional = PREDICT_functional_impact(variants, genes)
            convergence = CHECK_convergent_evolution(region, other_species)

            YIELD adaptation_signal(region, composite_score, genes, functional)

    OUTPUT: genomic_regions_under_selection
formulation.formal_specification: Selection(PARK2): Tajimas_D < -2 OR iHS > 2 OR FST > 99th_percentile

validation.expected_outcome: Selection signal replicates in independent populations, functional assay confirms fitness effect

discoveries.title: Cross-Modal PALB2 Regulatory Axis Spanning Transcriptome to Metabolome
discoveries.hypothesis: Transcript-protein-metabolite cascade from PALB2 exhibits coherent temporal dynamics (lag < 2h) through p53 tumor suppressor network
discoveries.core_mechanism: Phosphoproteomic time-course reveals PALB2-encoded kinase phosphorylates 23 substrates within 15 minutes of stimulation. Downstream metabolite flux through p53 tumor suppressor network increases 2.8-fold in thyroid follicles, detected by LC-MS.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM MultiOmicsIntegration:
    INPUT: transcriptomics, proteomics, metabolomics, sample_metadata

    # Normalize each modality
    rna_norm = VOOM_TMM_normalize(transcriptomics)
    prot_norm = QUANTILE_normalize(proteomics)
    metab_norm = PARETO_scale(metabolomics)

    # Multi-block integration
    mofa_model = MOFA2_fit(
        views=[rna_norm, prot_norm, metab_norm],
        n_factors=15,
        convergence_tol=1e-4
    )

    FOR each factor IN mofa_model.factors:
        # Identify top features per modality
        rna_features = TOP_LOADINGS(factor, view='rna', n=50)
        prot_features = TOP_LOADINGS(factor, view='protein', n=50)
        metab_features = TOP_LOADINGS(factor, view='metabolite', n=50)

        # Test biological coherence
        pathway_enrich = GSEA(rna_features, gene_sets='KEGG')
        IF pathway_enrich.fdr < 0.05:
            # Validate temporal coherence
            lag_corr = CROSS_CORRELATION(
                rna_features.expression,
                prot_features.abundance,
                max_lag=24h
            )
            IF lag_corr.optimal_lag < 6h:
                YIELD omics_axis(factor, rna_features, prot_features, metab_features)

    OUTPUT: integrated_multi_omics_factors
formulation.formal_specification: For all (x_RNA, x_protein, x_metab) in PALB2_cascade: MI(x_i, x_j) > 0.3 AND lag < 6h

discoveries.hypothesis: Promoter methylation at PALB2 (>60% CpG methylation) inversely correlates with p53 tumor suppressor network activity (r < -0.7)
discoveries.core_mechanism: Oxidative stress induces TET1-mediated demethylation at PALB2 promoter CpG island. Bisulfite sequencing reveals 45% reduction in methylation, correlating with p53 tumor suppressor network reactivation in cardiac myocytes (Spearman rho = -0.82).

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM EpigeneticModifierDiscovery:
    INPUT: bisulfite_seq_case, bisulfite_seq_control, rna_seq

    meth_matrix_case = BISMARK_quantify(bisulfite_seq_case)
    meth_matrix_ctrl = BISMARK_quantify(bisulfite_seq_control)

    dmrs = DSS_call_DMR(
        case=meth_matrix_case,
        control=meth_matrix_ctrl,
        delta_beta=0.2,
        min_cpgs=5
    )

    FOR each DMR IN dmrs:
        nearby_genes = ANNOTATE_nearest_genes(DMR, distance=10kb)
        FOR each gene IN nearby_genes:
            expr_corr = CORRELATE(DMR.methylation, gene.expression)
            IF abs(expr_corr.r) > 0.6 AND expr_corr.pval < 0.01:
                chromatin = ENCODE_chromatin_state(DMR)
                IF chromatin IN ['promoter', 'enhancer']:
                    YIELD epigenetic_discovery(DMR, gene, expr_corr)

    OUTPUT: differentially_methylated_regulatory_regions

    INPUT: target_gene, optimization_objectives, constraints

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM RareVariantDiscovery:
    INPUT: WGS_reads, reference_genome, phenotype_matrix

    aligned_reads = BWA_MEM(WGS_reads, reference_genome)
    variants = GATK_HaplotypeCaller(aligned_reads, confidence=30)

    FOR each variant IN variants:
        IF MAF(variant) < 0.01:
            annotation = VEP_annotate(variant)
            IF annotation.impact IN ['HIGH', 'MODERATE']:
                cadd_score = CADD_score(variant)
                IF cadd_score > 20:

                    IF burden_test.pvalue < 5e-8:
                        YIELD validated_discovery(variant, annotation)

    OUTPUT: prioritized_rare_variants with functional evidence

discoveries.title: IFNG x Environmental Factor Epistasis Driving Phenotypic Plasticity
discoveries.hypothesis: Dietary metabolite exposure modifies IFNG penetrance through PI3K/AKT/mTOR signaling-dependent epigenetic priming (interaction P < 0.001)
discoveries.core_mechanism: Dietary folate modulates one-carbon metabolism, altering SAM:SAH ratio. This shifts DNMT3A activity at IFNG locus, creating bistable methylation states in cochlear hair cells that gate PI3K/AKT/mTOR signaling responsiveness to subsequent stimuli.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM GeneEnvironmentInteraction:
    INPUT: genotypes, phenotypes, environmental_exposures

    geno_matrix = STANDARDIZE(genotypes)
    env_matrix = STANDARDIZE(environmental_exposures)

    FOR each SNP IN geno_matrix:
        FOR each ENV IN env_matrix:
            # Full interaction model
            model = LINEAR_MIXED_MODEL(
                phenotype ~ SNP + ENV + SNP*ENV + covariates,
                random=~1|family
            )

            interaction_pval = model.pvalue['SNP*ENV']
            IF interaction_pval < (0.05 / n_tests):  # Bonferroni
                # Stratified analysis
                effect_low_env = EFFECT_in_stratum(SNP, ENV < median)
                effect_high_env = EFFECT_in_stratum(SNP, ENV >= median)

                IF sign(effect_low_env) != sign(effect_high_env):
                    YIELD crossover_interaction(SNP, ENV, model)
                ELIF abs(effect_high_env) > 2*abs(effect_low_env):
                    YIELD amplifying_interaction(SNP, ENV, model)

    OUTPUT: significant_gene_environment_interactions
formulation.formal_specification: beta_GxE(v,E) != 0: P(interaction) < alpha_bonf AND |beta_high_E - beta_low_E| > 2*SE

validation.expected_outcome: Interaction p < Bonferroni threshold, replication in 2+ cohorts, biological plausibility

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM StructuralVariantDetection:
    INPUT: long_reads, short_reads, reference

    sv_calls_lr = SNIFFLES2(long_reads, reference, min_support=3)
    sv_calls_sr = MANTA(short_reads, reference)

    merged_sv = SURVIVOR_merge(sv_calls_lr, sv_calls_sr, dist=500bp)

    FOR each SV IN merged_sv:
        breakpoints = ASSEMBLY_validate(SV, reads)
        IF breakpoints.confident:
            gene_impact = ANNOTATE_genes(SV, gtf_file)
            tad_disruption = CHECK_TAD_boundaries(SV, hic_data)
            expression_change = COMPARE_expression(SV.carriers, SV.non_carriers)
            IF abs(expression_change.log2fc) > 1:
                YIELD validated_SV(SV, gene_impact, tad_disruption)

    OUTPUT: functionally_validated_structural_variants

equations: LD_Score = Sum_j(r^2_ij) for tag SNP i
formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM CommonVariantAssociation:
    INPUT: genotype_array, phenotype_vector, covariates

    qc_genotypes = PLINK_QC(genotype_array, maf=0.01, hwe=1e-6, geno=0.02)
    pca_components = FLASHPCA(qc_genotypes, n_components=20)

    FOR each SNP IN qc_genotypes:
        beta, se, pval = LINEAR_REGRESSION(
            phenotype ~ SNP + covariates + pca_components
        )
        IF pval < 5e-8:
            fine_map = FINEMAP(SNP, ld_matrix, n_causal=1)
            credible_set = SUSIE(region, pip_threshold=0.95)
            functional = ENCODE_overlap(credible_set)

            genes = ANNOTATE_genes(region)
            functional = PREDICT_functional_impact(variants, genes)
            convergence = CHECK_convergent_evolution(region, other_species)

            YIELD adaptation_signal(region, composite_score, genes, functional)

    OUTPUT: genomic_regions_under_selection

discoveries.title: Engineered TGFB1 Variant with Enhanced Therapeutic Activity
discoveries.hypothesis: Codon-optimized TGFB1 construct achieves >3-fold increased protein yield while maintaining native TGF-beta pathway engagement
discoveries.core_mechanism: Machine learning-optimized TGFB1 coding sequence removes RNA secondary structure (deltaG increased by 8.2 kcal/mol) and rare codons. Ribosome profiling shows 3.5-fold increased translation efficiency in kidney nephrons, hyperactivating TGF-beta pathway.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM SyntheticAlleleDesign:
    INPUT: target_gene, optimization_objectives, constraints

    wt_sequence = FETCH_reference(target_gene)
    protein_structure = ALPHAFOLD_predict(wt_sequence)

    codon_optimized = CAI_optimize(
        wt_sequence,
        host_organism='human',
        gc_content_target=0.55
    )

    mfe_optimized = NUPACK_minimize_structure(codon_optimized)

    FOR mutation_site IN protein_structure.active_sites:
        variants = ROSETTA_design(
            protein_structure,
            site=mutation_site,
            objective='stability'
        )
        FOR var IN variants:
            IF var.ddG < -2.0 AND var.solubility_score > 0.8:
                toxicity = PREDICT_toxicity(var.sequence)
                IF NOT toxicity.flagged:
                    YIELD synthetic_candidate(var, stability=var.ddG)

    OUTPUT: optimized_synthetic_allele_designs
formulation.formal_specification: Synthetic(TGFB1): CAI > 0.8 AND MFE_structure > -20 kcal/mol AND translation_rate > 3x wildtype

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM RareVariantDiscovery:
    INPUT: WGS_reads, reference_genome, phenotype_matrix

                    IF burden_test.pvalue < 5e-8:

    OUTPUT: prioritized_rare_variants with functional evidence

discoveries.title: Cross-Modal APOE Regulatory Axis Spanning Transcriptome to Metabolome
discoveries.hypothesis: Transcript-protein-metabolite cascade from APOE exhibits coherent temporal dynamics (lag < 2h) through DNA damage repair (HDR/NHEJ)
discoveries.core_mechanism: Phosphoproteomic time-course reveals APOE-encoded kinase phosphorylates 23 substrates within 15 minutes of stimulation. Downstream metabolite flux through DNA damage repair (HDR/NHEJ) increases 2.8-fold in retinal ganglion, detected by LC-MS.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM MultiOmicsIntegration:
    INPUT: transcriptomics, proteomics, metabolomics, sample_metadata

    # Normalize each modality
    rna_norm = VOOM_TMM_normalize(transcriptomics)
    prot_norm = QUANTILE_normalize(proteomics)
    metab_norm = PARETO_scale(metabolomics)

    # Multi-block integration
    mofa_model = MOFA2_fit(
        views=[rna_norm, prot_norm, metab_norm],
        n_factors=15,
        convergence_tol=1e-4
    )

    FOR each factor IN mofa_model.factors:
        # Identify top features per modality
        rna_features = TOP_LOADINGS(factor, view='rna', n=50)
        prot_features = TOP_LOADINGS(factor, view='protein', n=50)
        metab_features = TOP_LOADINGS(factor, view='metabolite', n=50)

        # Test biological coherence
        pathway_enrich = GSEA(rna_features, gene_sets='KEGG')
        IF pathway_enrich.fdr < 0.05:
            # Validate temporal coherence
            lag_corr = CROSS_CORRELATION(
                rna_features.expression,
                prot_features.abundance,
                max_lag=24h
            )
            IF lag_corr.optimal_lag < 6h:
                YIELD omics_axis(factor, rna_features, prot_features, metab_features)

    OUTPUT: integrated_multi_omics_factors
formulation.formal_specification: For all (x_RNA, x_protein, x_metab) in APOE_cascade: MI(x_i, x_j) > 0.3 AND lag < 6h

validation.expected_outcome: Temporal lag < 6h between layers, pathway coherence score > 0.7, perturbation confirms directionality

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM StructuralVariantDetection:
    INPUT: long_reads, short_reads, reference

    sv_calls_lr = SNIFFLES2(long_reads, reference, min_support=3)
    sv_calls_sr = MANTA(short_reads, reference)

    merged_sv = SURVIVOR_merge(sv_calls_lr, sv_calls_sr, dist=500bp)

    FOR each SV IN merged_sv:
        breakpoints = ASSEMBLY_validate(SV, reads)
        IF breakpoints.confident:
            gene_impact = ANNOTATE_genes(SV, gtf_file)
            tad_disruption = CHECK_TAD_boundaries(SV, hic_data)
            expression_change = COMPARE_expression(SV.carriers, SV.non_carriers)
            IF abs(expression_change.log2fc) > 1:
                YIELD validated_SV(SV, gene_impact, tad_disruption)

    OUTPUT: functionally_validated_structural_variants
formulation.formal_specification: SV subset Genome: |SV| > 50bp AND breakpoint_confidence > 0.99 AND exists g in IFNG: overlap(SV, g) > 0

discoveries.title: Long-Range Chromatin Interaction Network Regulating MYC Expression
discoveries.hypothesis: Topologically associating domain (TAD) boundaries at MYC locus encode positional information directing tissue-specific Glycolysis/gluconeogenesis activation
discoveries.core_mechanism: Super-enhancer at MYC locus integrates signals from 12 transcription factors. Phase-separated condensates visualized by IF co-localize BRD4 and MED1 at MYC, coordinating burst-like transcription feeding into Glycolysis/gluconeogenesis.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM RegulatoryNetworkInference:
    INPUT: scRNA_seq, ATAC_seq, TF_motifs

    gene_expr = SEURAT_normalize(scRNA_seq)
    chromatin_access = MACS2_peaks(ATAC_seq)

    grn_scaffold = SCENIC_infer_regulons(gene_expr, TF_motifs)
    enhancer_links = ABC_model(chromatin_access, gene_expr, hic_data)

    FOR each TF_regulon IN grn_scaffold:
        target_genes = TF_regulon.targets
        FOR each target IN target_genes:
            enhancers = FILTER(enhancer_links, target_gene=target)
            IF TF.binding_site IN enhancers:
                confidence = GRNBOOST2_importance(TF, target)
                IF confidence > 0.8:
                    YIELD regulatory_edge(TF, target, enhancers, confidence)

    network = BUILD_NETWORK(all_edges)
    OUTPUT: tissue_specific_gene_regulatory_network
formulation.formal_specification: TF -> MYC: binding_affinity(TF, motif) > Kd_threshold AND chromatin_accessible = TRUE

discoveries.core_mechanism: Machine learning-optimized APOE coding sequence removes RNA secondary structure (deltaG increased by 8.2 kcal/mol) and rare codons. Ribosome profiling shows 3.5-fold increased translation efficiency in skin keratinocytes, hyperactivating DNA damage repair (HDR/NHEJ).

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM SyntheticAlleleDesign:
    INPUT: target_gene, optimization_objectives, constraints

    wt_sequence = FETCH_reference(target_gene)
    protein_structure = ALPHAFOLD_predict(wt_sequence)

    codon_optimized = CAI_optimize(
        wt_sequence,
        host_organism='human',
        gc_content_target=0.55
    )

    mfe_optimized = NUPACK_minimize_structure(codon_optimized)

    FOR mutation_site IN protein_structure.active_sites:
        variants = ROSETTA_design(
            protein_structure,
            site=mutation_site,
            objective='stability'
        )
        FOR var IN variants:
            IF var.ddG < -2.0 AND var.solubility_score > 0.8:
                toxicity = PREDICT_toxicity(var.sequence)
                IF NOT toxicity.flagged:
                    YIELD synthetic_candidate(var, stability=var.ddG)

    OUTPUT: optimized_synthetic_allele_designs
formulation.formal_specification: Synthetic(APOE): CAI > 0.8 AND MFE_structure > -20 kcal/mol AND translation_rate > 3x wildtype

validation.method: In silico simulation with 10,000 bootstrapped replicates
validation.expected_outcome: Expression increase > 3-fold, protein function retained (> 80% wildtype activity)

industrial_impact.application: Gene therapy vector optimization, mRNA therapeutic design, protein replacement therapy

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: Novel SMN1-Centered Signaling Hub Linking Metabolism and Immunity
discoveries.hypothesis: SMN1 functions as master regulator hub connecting MAPK/ERK cascade to three or more downstream effector modules
discoveries.core_mechanism: Interactome mapping identifies SMN1 protein as a scaffold bridging MAPK/ERK cascade kinases with previously unlinked autophagy machinery. Proximity labeling (BioID) in bone marrow captures 47 high-confidence interactors, 8 of which are novel.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM PathwayDiscovery:
    INPUT: differential_expression, protein_interactions, metabolic_network

    de_genes = FILTER(differential_expression, padj < 0.01, abs_lfc > 1)

    # Seed expansion on PPI network
    seed_subnetwork = RANDOM_WALK_RESTART(
        ppi_graph=protein_interactions,
        seeds=de_genes,
        restart_prob=0.4,
        max_steps=1000
    )

    # Module detection
    modules = LEIDEN_clustering(seed_subnetwork, resolution=1.0)

    FOR each module IN modules:
        # Functional enrichment
        go_enrich = HYPERGEOMETRIC_test(module.genes, GO_terms)
        kegg_enrich = HYPERGEOMETRIC_test(module.genes, KEGG_pathways)

        IF NOT go_enrich.hits:  # Potentially novel pathway
            # Validate with metabolic connectivity
            metab_links = MAP_to_metabolic_network(module.genes, metabolic_network)
            flux_change = FBA_flux_analysis(metab_links, constraints=de_genes)

            IF flux_change.significance < 0.01:
                hub_genes = CENTRALITY_analysis(module)
                YIELD novel_pathway(module, hub_genes, metab_links, flux_change)

    OUTPUT: discovered_pathway_modules
formulation.formal_specification: Module superset SMN1: |Module| > 10 genes AND density > 0.3 AND GO_enrichment_FDR < 0.05

validation.expected_outcome: Module coherence > 0.6, flux prediction accuracy > 75%, novel interactions validate in Co-IP

industrial_impact.application: Novel drug target, mechanism-based therapeutic design, repurposing opportunity identification

failure_modes: Hub gene artifact from study bias
mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: Novel Rare Pathogenic Variant in BRCA2 Associated with Developmental Phenotype in Homo sapiens
discoveries.hypothesis: Loss-of-function variants in BRCA2 disrupt JAK/STAT signaling signaling, resulting in measurable phenotypic divergence with effect size >0.5 standard deviations
discoveries.core_mechanism: The variant introduces a premature stop codon at position p.R248*, leading to nonsense-mediated decay of BRCA2 mRNA. In pancreatic islets, this eliminates negative feedback on JAK/STAT signaling, causing constitutive activation and downstream gene expression changes detectable by RNA-seq (FDR < 0.05).

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM RareVariantDiscovery:
    INPUT: WGS_reads, reference_genome, phenotype_matrix

    aligned_reads = BWA_MEM(WGS_reads, reference_genome)
    variants = GATK_HaplotypeCaller(aligned_reads, confidence=30)

    FOR each variant IN variants:
        IF MAF(variant) < 0.01:
            annotation = VEP_annotate(variant)
            IF annotation.impact IN ['HIGH', 'MODERATE']:
                cadd_score = CADD_score(variant)
                IF cadd_score > 20:
                    burden_test = SKAT_O(variant, phenotype_matrix)
                    IF burden_test.pvalue < 5e-8:
                        YIELD validated_discovery(variant, annotation)

    OUTPUT: prioritized_rare_variants with functional evidence
formulation.formal_specification: For all v in Variants(BRCA2): MAF(v) < 0.01 AND CADD(v) > 20 implies P(pathogenic|v) > 0.9

validation.expected_outcome: Effect size > 0.5 SD, penetrance > 0.8, AUROC for classification > 0.85

industrial_impact.application: Diagnostic genetic test development, newborn screening panel inclusion, carrier testing

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: FGF2 x Environmental Factor Epistasis Driving Phenotypic Plasticity
discoveries.hypothesis: Dietary metabolite exposure modifies FGF2 penetrance through Wnt/beta-catenin-dependent epigenetic priming (interaction P < 0.001)
discoveries.core_mechanism: Dietary folate modulates one-carbon metabolism, altering SAM:SAH ratio. This shifts DNMT3A activity at FGF2 locus, creating bistable methylation states in lung epithelium that gate Wnt/beta-catenin responsiveness to subsequent stimuli.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM GeneEnvironmentInteraction:
    INPUT: genotypes, phenotypes, environmental_exposures

    geno_matrix = STANDARDIZE(genotypes)
    env_matrix = STANDARDIZE(environmental_exposures)

    FOR each SNP IN geno_matrix:
        FOR each ENV IN env_matrix:
            # Full interaction model
            model = LINEAR_MIXED_MODEL(
                phenotype ~ SNP + ENV + SNP*ENV + covariates,
                random=~1|family
            )

            interaction_pval = model.pvalue['SNP*ENV']
            IF interaction_pval < (0.05 / n_tests):  # Bonferroni
                # Stratified analysis
                effect_low_env = EFFECT_in_stratum(SNP, ENV < median)
                effect_high_env = EFFECT_in_stratum(SNP, ENV >= median)

                IF sign(effect_low_env) != sign(effect_high_env):
                    YIELD crossover_interaction(SNP, ENV, model)
                ELIF abs(effect_high_env) > 2*abs(effect_low_env):
                    YIELD amplifying_interaction(SNP, ENV, model)

    OUTPUT: significant_gene_environment_interactions
formulation.formal_specification: beta_GxE(v,E) != 0: P(interaction) < alpha_bonf AND |beta_high_E - beta_low_E| > 2*SE

validation.expected_outcome: Interaction p < Bonferroni threshold, replication in 2+ cohorts, biological plausibility

industrial_impact.application: Precision prevention program, personalized lifestyle intervention, risk stratification

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: Long-Range Chromatin Interaction Network Regulating HBB Expression
discoveries.hypothesis: Topologically associating domain (TAD) boundaries at HBB locus encode positional information directing tissue-specific Cell cycle control activation
discoveries.core_mechanism: Super-enhancer at HBB locus integrates signals from 12 transcription factors. Phase-separated condensates visualized by IF co-localize BRD4 and MED1 at HBB, coordinating burst-like transcription feeding into Cell cycle control.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM RegulatoryNetworkInference:
    INPUT: scRNA_seq, ATAC_seq, TF_motifs

    gene_expr = SEURAT_normalize(scRNA_seq)
    chromatin_access = MACS2_peaks(ATAC_seq)

    grn_scaffold = SCENIC_infer_regulons(gene_expr, TF_motifs)
    enhancer_links = ABC_model(chromatin_access, gene_expr, hic_data)

    FOR each TF_regulon IN grn_scaffold:
        target_genes = TF_regulon.targets
        FOR each target IN target_genes:
            enhancers = FILTER(enhancer_links, target_gene=target)
            IF TF.binding_site IN enhancers:
                confidence = GRNBOOST2_importance(TF, target)
                IF confidence > 0.8:
                    YIELD regulatory_edge(TF, target, enhancers, confidence)

    network = BUILD_NETWORK(all_edges)
    OUTPUT: tissue_specific_gene_regulatory_network
formulation.formal_specification: TF -> HBB: binding_affinity(TF, motif) > Kd_threshold AND chromatin_accessible = TRUE

validation.expected_outcome: TF perturbation changes target expression (p < 0.001), CRISPR screen validates > 70% edges

industrial_impact.application: Drug target identification, combination therapy design, resistance mechanism elucidation

mitigation_strategies: Transparent reporting of all tested hypotheses
External data and safety monitoring board review

discoveries.title: Population-Frequency BMP4 Polymorphism Modulating Drug Response Across Ancestries
discoveries.hypothesis: The minor allele at BMP4 rs-variant confers differential protein binding affinity (Kd ratio >2.0), altering pathway flux through Autophagy regulation
discoveries.core_mechanism: The T>C transition creates a novel binding site for transcription factor STAT3 in the BMP4 promoter. ChIP-seq in adipose tissue confirms increased STAT3 occupancy (fold-enrichment = 4.2), amplifying Autophagy regulation output under inflammatory conditions.

equations: LD_Score = Sum_j(r^2_ij) for tag SNP i
formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM CommonVariantAssociation:
    INPUT: genotype_array, phenotype_vector, covariates

    qc_genotypes = PLINK_QC(genotype_array, maf=0.01, hwe=1e-6, geno=0.02)
    pca_components = FLASHPCA(qc_genotypes, n_components=20)

    FOR each SNP IN qc_genotypes:
        beta, se, pval = LINEAR_REGRESSION(
            phenotype ~ SNP + covariates + pca_components
        )
        IF pval < 5e-8:
            fine_map = FINEMAP(SNP, ld_matrix, n_causal=1)
            credible_set = SUSIE(region, pip_threshold=0.95)
            functional = ENCODE_overlap(credible_set)
            YIELD gwas_hit(SNP, beta, fine_map, functional)

    OUTPUT: genome_wide_significant_associations
formulation.formal_specification: Exists beta in R: beta != 0 AND SE(beta) < |beta|/2 AND p(beta=0) < 5e-8 for BMP4 <-> trait

validation.expected_outcome: Replication p < 0.05 in independent cohort, consistent effect direction, PIP > 0.5

discoveries.title: Complex Structural Rearrangement at EGF Locus Revealing Enhancer Hijacking Mechanism
discoveries.hypothesis: Tandem duplication at EGF creates neo-regulatory elements that ectopically activate Notch signaling in non-canonical tissues
discoveries.core_mechanism: A 150kb inversion repositions a strong enhancer element from its native locus to within 20kb of EGF. Hi-C contact maps in brain cortex show novel chromatin loop formation (interaction score increase = 2.8-fold), driving ectopic Notch signaling activation.

formulation.pseudocode:
ALGORITHM StructuralVariantDetection:
    INPUT: long_reads, short_reads, reference

    sv_calls_lr = SNIFFLES2(long_reads, reference, min_support=3)
    sv_calls_sr = MANTA(short_reads, reference)

    merged_sv = SURVIVOR_merge(sv_calls_lr, sv_calls_sr, dist=500bp)

    FOR each SV IN merged_sv:
        breakpoints = ASSEMBLY_validate(SV, reads)
        IF breakpoints.confident:
            gene_impact = ANNOTATE_genes(SV, gtf_file)
            tad_disruption = CHECK_TAD_boundaries(SV, hic_data)
            expression_change = COMPARE_expression(SV.carriers, SV.non_carriers)
            IF abs(expression_change.log2fc) > 1:
                YIELD validated_SV(SV, gene_impact, tad_disruption)

    OUTPUT: functionally_validated_structural_variants
formulation.formal_specification: SV subset Genome: |SV| > 50bp AND breakpoint_confidence > 0.99 AND exists g in EGF: overlap(SV, g) > 0

validation.method: In vivo mouse model phenotypic assessment
validation.expected_outcome: PCR/Sanger validation rate > 95%, expression change > 2-fold in carriers
